txt.en: 'The Dunlendings are preparing to attack the summit of Dol Baran in force, [placeholder]. Should they gain this ground, we will lose the vantage to observe their army as it marches from Wulf's Cleft, and our forces at the Ford of Isen will be perilously vulnerable.\n\n'We must hold off this assault!'

'You have our thanks, [placeholder]. With this battle, we have broken the strength of the Dunlendings' skirmishing force.\n\n'Soon, they will likely move against us in much greater force from Wulf's Cleft, but in so doing they will show their hand, and we will be prepared for them.'
The Dunlendings prepare to assault Dol Baran in one last effort to take the foothold.
Captain Féarn awaits your attention atop Dol Baran.\n\nYou should speak to Captain Féarn when you are ready to defend against the Dunlendings' assault.
Talk to Captain Féarn atop Dol Baran
Captain Féarn awaits you atop Dol Baran.\n\nYou should speak with Captain Féarn regarding the victory you recently achieved there.
